Plot: Awaiting trial Michael Bosworth (Mickey Rourke) a psychotic criminal uses his lawyer to make a desperate escape from justice. During the escape the two who are romantically involved become separated and Bosworth invades the Cornell (Anthony Hopkins) home to take cover. The FBI nabs Bosworth's female 
lawyer and convinces her to help them track down where he's hiding.
